title: Blueberry lemon cake
ingredients: ['75g butter, melted', '200g caster sugar', '1 lemon, juiced', '2 eggs', '200g plain flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '120ml milk', '2 tablespoons lemon zest', '150g fresh blueberries', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '4 tablespoons caster sugar']
